summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank for the account of Gratitude America, Ltd. It details account balances, transactions, and service charges for the period from February 1, 2016, to February 29, 2016. The statement includes information about deposits, checks paid, and interest earned.
locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The account balance for Gratitude America, Ltd. as of February 29, 2016, was $73,374.13.
A total of $150,000.00 was deposited into the account on February 3, 2016.
Two checks were paid during the statement period: Check 674 for $40,000.00 on February 8, 2016, and Check 675 for $37,500.00 on February 10, 2016.
Interest earned during the statement period was $6.70.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors or inquiries regarding electronic and non-electronic funds transfers.
